Bash(# Check existence and sizes of a sample of high priority files

  "/mnt/c/Users/anthony.nicholas/patent-drafter-ai/src/repositories/searchHistoryRepository.ts"
)

for file in "${files[@]}"; do
  if [ -f "$file" ]; then
    lines=$(wc -l < "$file")
    echo "$file: $lines lines"
  else
    echo "$file: DOES NOT EXIST"
  fi
done)
